short_summary: Acquisition and delivery of miscellaneous grocery products
description: TRANCCLAIM entre correctionnal service of Canada(CSC) et lively for services(food, beverages and grocery)
tags: Tenders and Treasury and austerity measures
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice Type and Method

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a **Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**.

#### Goods and Services

The PSPC is seeking bids for the acquisition and delivery of **miscellaneous grocery products** to CSC’s Housing Units in the province of Quebec, Canada.

#### Notice Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3697278636
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 22nd, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT
*   **Contract Category**: General Supplies - Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and others (see attached trade agreements list)

#### Deliverable Locations

The following locations are the delivery points for the services:

*   **Cowansville**
*   **Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines**
*   **Laval**

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Person**: Ly, Selina (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email**: selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19320966?extsite=MTkzMjA5NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19320966?extsite=MTkzMjA5NjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Solicitation Documents

The Solicitation Documents are available for download from the above notice URL.

#### Important Dates

*   **Publication Date**: April 5th, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: April 22nd, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT

Please ensure that your bid is received by the tender closing date and time to be considered.

Note: This tender announcement has expired on April 22, 2024. For the most up-to-date and current tenders, please visit the PSPC website. 

.extensions note:  aveidoss -- Please write a conclusion to this tender announcement, ensuring the reader understand this notice and respects the validity of tender bids.endif. extensions extension=OpenTenderAnnouncement
